Text: To qualify for the 10% CGT rate under 'investors' relief' the following conditions need to be met: shares must be newly issued and subscribed for by the individual for new consideration be in an unlisted trading company, or an unlisted holding company of a trading group have been issued by the company on or after 17 March 2016 and have been held for a period of three years from 6 April 2016 have been held continuously for a period of three years before disposal.
Cause: shares must be newly issued and subscribed for by the individual for new consideration be in an unlisted trading company, or an unlisted holding company of a trading group have been issued by the company on or after 17 March 2016 and have been held for a period of three years from 6 April 2016 have been held continuously for a period of three years before disposal.
Effect: To qualify for the 10% CGT rate under 'investors' relief'
Sentence: <e2>To qualify for the 10% CGT rate under 'investors' relief'</e2> the following conditions need to be met: <e1>shares must be newly issued and subscribed for by the individual for new consideration be in an unlisted trading company, or an unlisted holding company of a trading group have been issued by the company on or after 17 March 2016 and have been held for a period of three years from 6 April 2016 have been held continuously for a period of three years before disposal.</e1>
